items.name: JS Visualizer
items.description: Visualised debouncing, throttling, delegation, event bubbling and many more important concepts of javascript

items.name: Food Ordering App
items.description: A food ordering app built in vanilla javascript with features like searching, filtering, pagination, tagging, typeahead and local storage

items.name: LinkedChain
items.description: A decentralized Q/A application working on ethereum blockchain made for EthIndia online hackathon deployed on rinkeby network

items.name: E-commerce site
items.description: An e-commerce store website built using React.js and context API

items.name: MoodBook
items.description: MoodBook is a progressive web app(PWA) built with vanilla javascript with features like push notification, background synchronization, offline support and much more.

items.name: Todo List App
items.description: A Todo list app built in vanilla javascript with features like drag and drop tasks, local storage, filter tasks, edit and change tasks

items.name: EthPay
items.description: A dapp that works on compound finance and uniswap protocol. Enable users to easily swap ether to ANK, buy cool products and use chatrooms to connect with other users

items.name: APIsPanda
items.description: A web app built using reddit, github, nasa and giphy apis with features like searching, filtering and setting items as favourites.
